addReward(uint256).details: to add rewards to the staking contract once the allowance is given to this contract for 'rewardAmount' by the user

calculate(address).details: to calculate the rewards based on user staked 'amount' 'userIndex' - the index of the interest rate at the time of user stake. 'depositTime' - time of staking

params.name_: name of the contract  tokenAddress_ contract address of the token  rate_ rate multiplied by 100  lockduration_ duration in days

setRateAndLockduration(uint64,uint256).details: to set interest rates `lockduration_' lock daysto set lock duration days

stake(uint256).details: to stake 'amount' value of tokens  once the user has given allowance to the staking contract

withdraw().details: to withdraw user stakings after the lock period ends.

addReward(uint256).notice: Requirements: `rewardAmount` rewards to be added to the staking contract

setRateAndLockduration(uint64,uint256).notice: Requirements: `rate_` New effective interest rate multiplied by 100
